attributes.action: Proclaim to the House of Commons, that Speedway has returned to the City of Birmingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Additionally, we petition the Prime Minister to recognise the efforts made by the supporters of the Birmingham Brummies to the House, including such people as Brian Buck, who has led the campaign for over 20 years that has led to this outcome.

Finally, will the Prime Minister also acknowledge the contribution of the other supporters who make uo the brummiespeedway web site, which proved its worth in the harnessing of the support of the people of Birmingham.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
